string.text: Bribe Kuznetsov to Join the Military
Major Kuznetsov will accept a 8,000 RU payment to let you join the Military

You want to enlist? Well, you'll never pass the physical requirements will all the radiation you've absorbed in the Zone. Tell you what though, if you're willing to slip me 8,000 RU I might be persuaded to look the other way.
Very well. Welcome to the Military, soldier.
Stop Unauthorized Incursions
You have been assigned to lead an assault squad to clear out any unauthorized individuals.

HQ is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. I want you to take a squad and sweep an area for unauthorized personnel. Keep alert for any friendlies, but anyone else you see you are cleared to shoot on sight.
Great job. Keep it up you'll be in line for a commendation.
Reclaim Exclusion Zone Territory
You have been ordered to capture territory within the Zone.
Our unit has been tasked with pushing further into the Zone. I am looking for volunteers to recapture remote territories for us. Can I be confident in your cooperation?
Excellent work. Your success has helped us greatly.
Capture Enemy Combatant
You have been ordered to capture %s named %s. Deliver the prisoner alive to {npc_name}.
HQ has a identified a target they would like brought in for questioning. Find the target, take him into custody, and bring him to me. Wound him if you have to, but he must be brought back alive.
Outstanding work! I will notify HQ right away of your success.
Mercenary Interrogation
Major Kuznetsov has learned the location of a Mercenary officer. Find him and get any information you can off of him, even if it requires taking it from his corpse.

We need to find out more about these Mercenaries that have shown up here in the Zone. I have identified the location of a high-ranking member of their organization. I want you to find him and recover whatever information you can from him, using whatever tactics are necessary.
You have done well. This information will be valuable in determining who has hired these Mercenaries.
Recover Stolen Documents
A stalker has stolen classified documents from one of the research labs. Recover the documents before they can be smuggled out of the Zone.

A trespasser has infiltrated one of the underground locations and may have absconded with classified documents. Apprehend him and recover those documents with extreme urgency. You are authorized to use whatever force is necessary.
Outstanding. This information could have been very dangerous if it had fallen into the wrong hands.
Enforce the Cordon
Meet up with the Military squad and organize the assault to push out the unauthorized %s.
Lead the attack to remove the %s from the area.
We are planning an assault on a large gathering of %s that have invaded the area. Link up with the rest of the assault squad and lead the effort to dislodge the trespassers.
Look alive boys, here comes %s to lead us to victory!
Well done. You are a fine leader of men.
